sndlib.core.io.xml
Class SNDlibXmlValidator

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.io.xml.SNDlibXmlValidator

public class SNDlibXmlValidator
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the XML schemas for the network, model and solution XML files. It provides methods to validate the said XML files against their schemas.

The SNDlib XML format is described on the SNDlib webpage

Author:
Roman Klaehne

the validation errors
